Comments_List: This course developed the tools to mathematically model transport of materials through groundwater media through fluid dynamic principles.

This is a wonderful course taught at a comfortable pace by a professor that is invested in the general understanding of principles more than the detailed mathematics. Difficult fluid dymanic based problems are practiced in homeworks while exams are used to show understandings of important principles. Overall a very strong course with lots of learning.
I would recommend this course to students in any engineering degree as the principles can be applied to a myriad of media.
